artist: Artist: Pat Hui; Author: Nalan Singde
creditline: Gift of funds from Virginia Kremen in memory of Dr. Arnold Kremen
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: two images with Chinese text on small left image and English translation at right; roughly horizontal bands of color with white--reds, pinks, orange and yellow with blue-green at bottom right
medium: Watercolor and metallic ink pen on paper
title: Guest in sorrow hurts rushing cool evening, from a set of 24 poems
